mapper.select: SELECT purchase_id AS purchaseId, item_id AS itemId, user_id AS userId, -- 아래 2개 필드(itemName, price)는 Item 테이블과 조인해서 가져온다고 가정 i.name AS itemName, i.price AS price, purchase_date AS purchaseDate FROM MyItem m JOIN Item i ON m.item_id = i.item_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT purchase_id AS purchaseId, m.item_id AS itemId, m.user_id AS userId, i.name AS itemName, i.price AS price, purchase_date AS purchaseDate FROM MyItem m JOIN Item i ON m.item_id = i.item_id WHERE m.purchase_id = #{purchaseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MyItem (item_id, user_id, purchase_date) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{userId}, NOW())
